00241 inline bool CVarVector::SetElementsCount(int count, double value)
00242 {
00243        I_ASSERT(count >= 0);
00244 
00245        int oldCount = m_elements.size();
00246 
00247        m_elements.resize(count);
00248 
00249        for (int i = oldCount; i < count; ++i){
00250               m_elements[i] = value;
00251        }
00252 
00253        return true;
00254 }

00312 inline void CVarVector::Translate(const CVarVector& vector)
00313 {
00314        I_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00315 
00316        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00317        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00318               m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00319        }
00320 }

00335 inline void CVarVector::ScaledCumulate(const CVarVector& vector, double scale)
00336 {
00337        I_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00338 
00339        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00340        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00341               m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00342        }

00346 inline bool CVarVector::IsNull(double tolerance) const
00347 {
00348        return GetLength2() <= tolerance * tolerance;

00352 inline double CVarVector::GetDotProduct(const CVarVector& vector) const
00353 {
00354        I_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00355 
00356        double retVal = 0.0;
00357 
00358        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00359        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00360               retVal +=  m_elements[i] * vector.m_elements[i];
00361        }
00362 
00363        return retVal;
00364 }

00367 inline double CVarVector::GetLength2() const

00385 inline double CVarVector::GetDistance(const CVarVector& vector) const

00405 inline bool CVarVector::operator<(const CVarVector& vector) const
00406 {
00407        int count = m_elements.size();
00408        int vectorCount = vector.m_elements.size();
00409        int commonSize = qMin(count, vectorCount);
00410        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00411               int element = m_elements[i];
00412               int vectorElement = vector.m_elements[i];
00413               if (element != vectorElement){
00414                      return element < vectorElement;
00415               }
00416        }
00417 
00418        return count < vectorCount;
00419 }

00428               int element = m_elements[i];
00429               int vectorElement = vector.m_elements[i];
00430               if (element != vectorElement){
00431                      return element > vectorElement;
00432               }
00433        }
00434 
00435        return count > vectorCount;
00436 }

00521 inline CVarVector CVarVector::operator-() const
00522 {
00523        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00524 
00525        CVarVector retVal(elementsCount);
00526 
00527        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00528               retVal.m_elements[i] = -m_elements[i];

00531        return retVal;

00595 template <int Size>
00596 CVarVector::CVarVector(const TVector<Size, double>& vector)
00597 {
00598        m_elements.resize(Size);
00599 
00600 
00601        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00602               m_elements[i] = vector[i];
00603        }
